messages.subject: Quick! Need help with Kondou's  babe
messages.msgSnippet: Oh that just sounds all wrong doesn t it?  ^_^ Okay so I m taking part in a Christmas request thing on LJ and I can t remember  exactly where  NHK Miyuki came
messages.messageBody:
Oh that just sounds all wrong doesn't it? ^_^

Okay so I'm taking part in a Christmas request thing on LJ and I can't
remember exactly where NHK Miyuki came from wasn't she from some house
in Osaka?

*UGH* I've just been scolded by Child #2 who says "You should know this!"

*hangs head in shame* I should remember but my retentive brain cells are
not what they once were....
--
Barbara Sheridan
*Eppie Finalist* Bittersweet Surrender ~ from Cerridwen Press
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
http://www.dragonsdisciple.com
